name: Suman Devi
bio: Suman has over 12 years of experience guiding rural women in transforming traditional crafts into successful home-based businesses. She mentors in Hindi and focuses on market access for women.

name: Rajesh Kumar
bio: Rajesh works closely with women in rural Punjab, helping them set up small-scale dairy farms and sustainable agriculture practices. Fluent in Punjabi.

name: Meena Rani
bio: Meena helps women set up micro food-processing units. She speaks Tamil and teaches sustainable methods that are low-cost and efficient.

name: Arun Das
bio: Arun supports women entrepreneurs in Assam by guiding them in tea leaf cultivation and local sales. He communicates in Assamese and understands rural market dynamics.

name: Pooja Patel
bio: Pooja trains women in tailoring and helps them create home-based stitching businesses. She mentors in Gujarati and focuses on self-employment.

name: Anil Mandal
bio: Anil guides women in Odisha on how to set up small-scale fisheries and apply for local government support. He mentors in Odia.

name: Rukhsana Bano
bio: Rukhsana supports women in Urdu and specializes in low-cost home-based businesses like candle-making, soap, and craft items.

name: Subhendu Ghosh
bio: Subhendu mentors women farmers in Bengali and promotes eco-friendly farming practices, including vegetable and spice cultivation for local haats.

name: Savitri Nair
bio: Savitri teaches rural women how to make and sell basic Ayurvedic wellness products using local herbs. She speaks Malayalam fluently.

name: Veeresh Gowda
bio: Veeresh trains women in making eco-friendly soap, detergent, and self-care items using local ingredients. He mentors in Kannada.

name: Lakshmi Bai
bio: Lakshmi teaches women the art of textile design and how to run a local saree or boutique business. She mentors in Telugu.
